mapper.sql: id, userId, title, describe, detail, status, createTime, lastUpdate, classifyCode, browseNum,likeNum,trampleNum, isRecommend, recommendTime, tag, ip, factionId, commentNum, collectNum, reportNum
mapper.select:
SELECT c.id, c.userId, title, c.describe, detail, c.status, c.createTime, c.lastUpdate, classifyCode, browseNum,likeNum,trampleNum, isRecommend, recommendTime, tag, ip, factionId, commentNum, collectNum, reportNum, u.nickname,u.userPicturePath FROM bb_cheats c left join bb_user u on c.userId = u.id WHERE c.status = '0'
AND title like CONCAT('%',#{title},'%')
AND tag like CONCAT('%',#{tag},'%')
AND classifyCode like CONCAT(#{classifyCode},'%')
ORDER BY c.createTime DESC

SELECT c.id, c.userId, title, c.describe, detail, c.status, c.createTime, c.lastUpdate, classifyCode, browseNum, likeNum,trampleNum, isRecommend, recommendTime, tag, ip, factionId, commentNum, collectNum, reportNum, u.nickname,u.userPicturePath FROM bb_cheats c left join bb_user u on c.userId = u.id WHERE c.status = '0' and isRecommend = '1'
AND title like CONCAT('%',#{title},'%')
AND tag like CONCAT('%',#{tag},'%')
AND classifyCode like CONCAT(#{classifyCode},'%')
ORDER BY browseNum DESC

SELECT c.id, c.userId, title, c.describe, detail, c.status, c.createTime, c.lastUpdate, classifyCode, browseNum, likeNum,trampleNum, isRecommend, recommendTime, tag, ip, factionId, commentNum, collectNum, reportNum, u.nickname,u.userPicturePath FROM bb_cheats c left join bb_user u on c.userId = u.id WHERE c.status = '0' and isRecommend = '1'
AND title like CONCAT('%',#{title},'%')
AND tag like CONCAT('%',#{tag},'%')
AND classifyCode like CONCAT(#{classifyCode},'%')
ORDER BY c.createTime DESC

SELECT c.id,title FROM bb_cheats c WHERE c.status = '0' and isRecommend = '1'
AND title like CONCAT('%',#{title},'%')
AND tag like CONCAT('%',#{tag},'%')
AND classifyCode like CONCAT(#{classifyCode},'%')
ORDER BY c.createTime DESC

SELECT c.id, c.userId, title, c.describe, detail, c.status, c.createTime, c.lastUpdate, classifyCode, browseNum, likeNum,trampleNum, isRecommend, recommendTime, tag, ip, factionId, commentNum, collectNum, reportNum, (SELECT count(id) FROM abc12366_bangbang.bb_question_tip_off where sourceId = c.id and sourceType = 'cheats' and createUser = c.userId) isTip FROM bb_cheats c left join bb_user u on c.userId = u.id WHERE 1=1
AND (SELECT count(id) FROM abc12366_bangbang.bb_question_tip_off where sourceId = c.id and sourceType = 'cheats' and createUser = c.userId) > 0
AND c.userId = #{userId}
ORDER BY c.createTime DESC

SELECT c.id,c.title FROM bb_cheats c
left join bb_cheats_tag t on c.id = t.cheatsId
WHERE c.status = '0'
AND title like CONCAT('%',#{title},'%')
AND t.tagId = #{tag}
AND classifyCode like CONCAT(#{classifyCode},'%')
ORDER BY c.createTime DESC
